name: Stickman Boxing KO Champion
description:
You like boxing games and stickman games? This game is made for you! Enter the ring and play as an heroic Stickman Boxer.

This new boxing game is available for all stickman fans! Fight 4 professionals in intense combat. Fight using a variety of devastating punches and combos. Jab, cross, uppercut, give in all you have, but don’t forget to dodge!.
Master jabs, hooks, uppercuts, body punches and combine them with devastating Special Punches.
Can you be the stickman boxing world champion ? Your goal ? Become the WBSA champion (World Boxing Stickman Association).

Prove you are the best fighting master. Go through the levels and conquer the increasing difficulty. Unleash fierce punches and combos,

Don’t doubt yourself and gain the victory! Beat all opponents and become the king of boxing now!

Boxing superstar ko champion is a game that test your reflexes and your capacity to anticipate strikes. Become a real boxer with this game that will awake your warrior soul!

How to play?
Like in real boxing, you can throw many punches: uppercut, jab, cross and dodging. Knock-out all your opponents and the victory is yours.

Characteristics
- Boxing
- Stickman
- 4 opponents
- 20 levels
- Uppercut, jab, cross, dodge, special punch
- 1 ring
